The purpose of ng cache is to configure persistent disk cache and retrieve cache statistics.
There are two ways to manipulate cache object.
  • Manipulate the cache manually by updating angular.json
  • Manipulate the cache using ng cli
The path, environment, enable of Angular cache can be configured.
  • Enable
    • true or false.
  • Path
    • .angular/cache is the default base directory to store cache results.
  • Environment
    • all: allows disk cache on all machines.
    • local: allows disk cache only on development machines.
    • ci: allows disk cache only on continuous integration (CI) systems.
In the following screenshot, the path of cache is set to .angular-cache and the environment is set to all.
